meanings.definition: In a manner that causes death
meanings.sent1: The knight was mortally wounded in the battle.
meanings.sent2: The poison acted mortally fast on the rat.
meanings.sent3: The idea of a talking dog made the children laugh mortally.
meanings.sent4: The silence in the room was mortally loud.
meanings.sent5: The vampire's bite was mortally chilling.

meanings.definition: To a very great degree or extent
meanings.sent1: She was mortally afraid of spiders.
meanings.sent3: The cat was mortally curious about the new toy.
meanings.sent4: His hunger was mortally intense after the long hike.
